course_description: This class will examine the novels of the most famous Russian writer and thinker, who deeply influenced world literature. Topics for discussion include: Christianity and atheism, existentialism, the superman, the sources of evil, and freedom and suffering as moral categories.
sections: Class Nbr: 2124, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 7-8:15p, Instructor: E. Glazov-Corrigan, Status: Open
